name: Project Screwed Demo
description:
Together with up to three other players, you take on an dangerous mission to dig out the most sought after mineral in the hole galaxy. Rareium. Defend your base from dangerous enemies that try to stop you from stealing it from them. Repair and upgrade your base to overcome these obstacles.

Work together with your friends in this stressful couch co-op game. It takes place in a dome filled with machines that need to be manned for you to survive.

The game is balanced around four players using connected controllers, and it is recommended to read the how to play before starting the game! Hit L and R bumpers to join the game.

(We recommend to use Parsec to play with your friends)

**IMPORTANT**

This is just a demo for a game we are working on, which is set to release on steam late Q1 2023. Follow us on Instagram to see further updates and when to wishlist on steam! we would love to get some feedback from whoever tries it out.

Follow us on our sosials!
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lonelyoni_sb/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/LonelyOniSB
